sentences.en: a parody of a horror film
Anti - Utopian literature is a parody of Utopian literature.
sentences.cn: 反 乌托邦文学是对乌托邦文学的讽刺性模拟.

sentences.en: By the end of his life, Presley's vocals often descended close to self-parody.
sentences.cn: 在人生的最后阶段，猫王普雷斯利的歌曲大不如前，通常近乎于自我嘲弄。

sentences.en: Collage and pastiche are two important parody techniques employed in Ulysses.
sentences.cn: 摘要拼贴与仿作是《尤利西斯》中两种重要的戏拟技法.

sentences.en: Her performance contains a strong element of self-parody (= when someone makes fun of their own style ) .
sentences.cn: 她的表演包含了强烈的自嘲元素。

sentences.en: Mark Twain's A Double - Barreled Detective Story is a novella length parody of whodunits.
sentences.cn: 马克吐温的中篇小说《案中案》是对侦探小说的戏谑式模仿.

sentences.en: Parody Technique in travesty of knight stories reinforces the artistic effect in Don Quixote.
sentences.cn: 摘要滑稽模拟骑士小说的戏拟手法,给《堂吉诃德》带来了丰富的艺术效果.

sentences.en: Power lines creep across the valleys like a south Brazilian parody of cable cars.
sentences.cn: 电力线就像巴西南部的电缆车那样延伸到整个山谷.

sentences.en: Self - parody and saltiness riddled their core genre.
sentences.cn: 自我 嘲笑和直斥现实充斥了他们的核心文艺形式.

sentences.en: She has become a grotesque parody of her former elegant self.
sentences.cn: 她成为了以前那个举止优雅的自己的怪诞模仿品.

sentences.en: She laughed, twisting her shoulder in a horrible parody of coquetry.
sentences.cn: 她笑了, 一面扭动着肩膀,做出一副肉麻的卖弄风情的姿态.

sentences.en: The first , draft summit conclusions circulated by France were weak to the point of parody.
sentences.cn: 但对于欧盟来说,这却是向前迈了一步.

sentences.en: The parody was just a form of teasing.
sentences.cn: 那个拙劣的模仿只是一种揶揄.

sentences.en: The third part analyses the parody plays in destructing and reconstructing the Utopian fairy - tale world.
sentences.cn: 论文第三部分阐述戏仿行为对童话乌托邦世界的解构与建构作用.

sentences.en: The trial was a parody of justice.
sentences.cn: 这次审判是对法律的嘲弄.

sentences.en: Throughout the Twenties, Lardner tried in vain to write a hit song, so at last he turned to parody.
sentences.cn: 整个20年代，拉德纳尝试着想要写出一首走红歌曲，可是都失败了，于是最后转向戏仿他人的作品。

words.tran_cn: 诙谐文作者；打油诗作者

trans.tran_cn: 拙劣的模仿，恶搞，滑稽的模仿诗文
trans.tran_en: a piece of writing, music etc or an action that copies someone or something in an amusing way
to copy someone or something in a way that makes people laugh

trans.tran_cn: 滑稽地拙劣地模仿，把（他人诗文）模仿成滑稽体裁
